channel.title: Registration agency for Nigeria to be added to NE Codelist
channel.description:
Original post can be found [here](http://support.iatistandard.org/entries/107566973-Add-Registration-Agency-For-Nigeria), and a GitHub issue has been created [here](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/issues/96).
>An organisation in Nigeria require an IATI organisation identifier and they have confirmed that they have a valid registration with the Nigerian Corporate Affairs Commisson. Therefore I propose that we add the following details to the registration agency codelist at http://iatistandard.org/201/codelists/OrganisationRegistrationAgency/
>- Code: NG-CAC - Name: Nigerian Corporate Affairs Commission - Category: NG - URL: http://new.cac.gov.ng/home/ - Public database: Yes

item.title: Registration agency for Nigeria to be added to NE Codelist
item.dc:creator: rory_scott
item.description:
Original post can be found here, and a GitHub issue has been created here.

An organisation in Nigeria require an IATI organisation identifier and they have confirmed that they have a valid registration with the Nigerian Corporate Affairs Commisson. Therefore I propose that we add the following details to the registration agency codelist at http://iatistandard.org/201/codelists/OrganisationRegistrationAgency/

  • Code: NG-CAC
  • Name: Nigerian Corporate Affairs Commission
  • Category: NG
  • URL: http://new.cac.gov.ng/home/
  • Public database: Yes

Read full topic
item.source: Registration agency for Nigeria to be added to NE Codelist
